text:
NEW YORK STATE EDUCATIONAL
RADIO AND TELEVISION ASSOCIATION
/
The minutes of the GENERAL MEETING of the New York State Educational Radio
and Television Association meeting in the Westerner Room of the Hotel Syracuse
Country House, Syracuse, New York, at 3:30 p.m., Friday, April 5, 1963.
President Schein called the meeting to order.
APPROVAL OF MINUTES
The minutes of the September, 1962, meeting were approved as distributed.
TREASURER'S REPORT
See Attached
ELECTION OF OFFICERS
Mr. Schein presented a slate of officers which had been drawn up by the
Nominating Committee. The members present unanimously elected this slate
as officers for 1963-1964.
President
Vice-President
Secretary
Treasurer
Halas Jackim
Albert P. Fredette
John S. Porter
J. Michael Collins
ELECTION OF TRUSTEES
The President pointed out that the one-year terms of the following members
of the Board of Trustees expired with the Spring meeting:
Kenneth E. Buhrmaster
Donley E. Feddersen
Rt. Rev. Msgr. Timothy J. Flynn
McCrea Hazlett
Harry W. Porter
Donald M. Tower
The following people were elected to three-year terms on the Board to replace
those members whose terms had expired:
Richard A* Jones
Coy L. Ludwig
Les Martin, Jr.
William Millard
Jack Summerfield
Loran Twyford
